name: ice-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging ice-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging ice-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
flavor_text: A gem with an essence of ice. When held, it strengthens the power of an Ice-type move one time.
